newsitem.title: USA: Kansas fed cattle trade moderate at $69 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas fed cattle trade moderate at $69 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was moderate, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers steady.

Inquiry and demand moderate. Sales confirmed on 5,300 slaughter steers and 1,200 slaughter heifers Thursday. For the week to date 94,200 head including 18,600 head or about 20 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1125-1250 lbs 69.00.
Slaughter heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 975-1100 lbs 69.00.
Wk to date - 94,200 last week - 10,1000 last year - 65,300
